content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad we can talk about the rental price. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the excellent location of your apartment, I'm thinking an amount around 550 Euros per month would be fair. This price reflects both the convenience of living in the city center and my dependability as a tenant.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Wang. However, I'm looking for a price that truly reflects the value of my property. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your perspective, I would lower my proposal slightly and suggest renting the apartment for 580 Euros monthly. While acknowledging the importance of your investment, I believe this price represents a reasonable compromise as I maintain my commitment to being a responsible tenant.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mr. Wang. However, I believe my property deserves a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In light of your expectations, I would revise my offer again to 600 Euros per month. While still accommodating my role as a reliable tenant, this price reflects the market trends for such a desirable location. I hope this proposal can serve as a basis for further negotiations.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your persistence, Mr. Wang. However, for the quality and prime location of my property, I believe it deserves more. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Recognizing your standpoint, I would humbly adjust my offer one last time to 620 Euros a month. This reflects both the premium location and the confidence in my ability to be a trustworthy and responsible tenant. I hope this proposal can help us reach an agreement and move forward with the rental process.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your understanding, Mr. Wang. I agree to the price of 650 Euros a month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm glad we have found common ground, Mr. Wang. Thank you for considering my proposals, and I look forward to becoming a responsible tenant at your apartment in Duisburg. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
